title: Beat The Rake - 15 Poker Strategy Articles eBook

Learn about the advantages of position, when to bluff, which online poker sites are the best, how to find fish and avoid sharks, and learn all about today's neo-poker player.

This e-book strategy series is designed to help the reader understand what it takes to win at online poker. The 15 articles in this series span every aspect of the online poker industry. After reading this series you will understand:

1)	What winning players do to win at online poker
2)	How to play an aggressive style of poker, and eliminate passive plays
3)	Playing in position 
4)	Beating Sit and Go's
5)	The differences between live and online poker
6)	Finding and beating donkeys
7)	Poker psychology
8)	Bluffing and fold equity
9)	Strategies for handling tilt
10)	Avoiding trouble hands

More advice and holdem articles at http://www.online-poker-coach.com	

Chapters:
#1 - How do I Win at Poker?
#2 - Do you Focus Enough on your Position?
#3 - The Winning Mindset
#4 - Playing Aggressive Poker
#5 - Why You Shouldn't Call a Preflop Raise
#6 - Don't Give your Opponents Free Cards
#7 - Be Invisible
#8 - Bluffing
#9 - Preflop Mistakes
#10 - Turbo Six Max Sit n Go's
#11 - 7 Common Mistakes in Sit and Go's
#12 - Keeping A Chip Lead in Sit and Go's
#13 - Poker is About Small Edges
#14 - Fold Equity 101
#15 - Stay Calm

Enjoy this ebook collection of online poker strategy articles. We want to produce more ebooks like this in the future and will consider doing so if these e-books do well. Good luck in your next game of hold'em!
